title: 1 Random Mystery Skin
body: Can anyone answer why we haven't got a skin from Riot. Not sure if they are not doing it anymore but I'm just wondering. Any information will be appreciated

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, they're still rolling out the skins; furthermore, some regions are receiving the skins before others (for instance, EUW is currently rolling out the skins as we speak).
They've made no announcement of doing one this time around.
